function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on official governmental media as the primary source of information","Impact":"Underestimation of the risks and protective behaviors","Mitigation":"Encouraging diverse sources of information and fact-checking","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools for misinformation detection","People":"General public","Owner":"Media literacy organizations"},{"Description":"Trust in the source of information as a predictor of protective behaviors","Impact":"Misinformation and lack of compliance with protective measures","Mitigation":"Building trust through transparent and authentic communication","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent data sharing","People":"General public","Owner":"Government agencies and media outlets"},{"Description":"Dissemination of outdated or wrong health information through social media","Impact":"Increased risk of serious consequences and decreased public trust","Mitigation":"Promoting accurate and up-to-date health information, and debunking false information","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence for content moderation and fact-checking","People":"General public","Owner":"Social media platforms"}]}
